title: User Interface Design
content:
I have found this book:  
 [http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0120884364/ref=wl\_it\_dp/00...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194224/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0120884364/ref=wl_it_dp/002-5308340-6511269?%5Fencoding=UTF8&coliid=IL79RM17VRWBB&v=glance&colid=W7HQWWBV1UM3 "http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0120884364/ref=wl\_it\_dp/002-5308340-6511269?%5Fencoding=UTF8&coliid=IL79RM17VRWBB&v=glance&colid=W7HQWWBV1UM3")

User Interface Design and Evaluation (Morgan Kaufmann Series in Interactive Technologies) by Debbie Stone

Have anyone seen or heard about it?? It’s new realease and doesn’t have reviews. It is expensive and I really need some advice…

thks!!!  
susancita25
